SA16n1277:3: śāstramāha-trividhacittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyaṃ yaduta prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittam |
SA16n1277:11: (u) skandhānupādāya ye vikalpā tadyathā pañcaskandhānupādāya puruṣa ityucyate |
SA16n1277:16: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ || iti |
SA16n1277:17: yathā ca bhagavān bhikṣūnavocat-dharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ pratītyasamutpannā aniyatasvabhāvā nāmamātramanusmaraṇamātraṃ bhogamātram |
SA16n1277:18: imāneva pañcaskandhānupādāya nānā nāma pravartate sattvo manuṣyo deva ityādi iti |
SA16n1277:30: buddhā bhagavanto laukikānāṃ prajñaptito viyojanāya lokasatyena vyavaharanti |
SA16n1277:34: purā kila janā vastūpabhogakāmanayā vahuvastunāmutpattikāle ghaṭa ityādi nāma sthāpayāñcakruḥ |
SA16n1277:41: na patati mithyādṛṣṭau sukhānte duḥkhānte ca |
SA16n1277:45: anena dharmeṇa taccittaṃ damayitvā mārgaśāsanaṃ grāhayitvā paścātparamārthasatyamupadiśati |
SA16n1277:48: yo mārgasya lābhajñānaṃ sādhayati [sa] paramārthadharmopadeśārho bhavati |
SA16n1277:49: yathā bhagavata evaṃ cetaḥ parivitarka udabhut-paripavkāḥ khalu rāhulasya [bhikṣoḥ] vimuktiparipacanīyā dharmāḥ yannūnamahaṃ rāhulaṃ uttara āsravānāṃ kṣaye vinayeyamiti |
SA16n1277:50: tadyathā ghrāṇapākaḥ tadvināśe sukhaṃ janane durbhedanam |
SA16n1277:51: evaṃ lokasatyena cittaṃ damayitvā'tha paramārthajñānena vināśayati |
SA16n1277:53: yogī pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ [kiṃ] prajñaptisantaḥ [kiṃ vā] paramārthasanta iti jñātvā paścānnirodhasatyaṃ sākṣātkaroti |
SA16n1277:65: yathoktaṃ sūtre-lokasamudayaṃ paśyataḥ nāstīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati |
SA16n1277:66: lokanirodhaṃ paśyataḥ astīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati iti |
SA16n1277:68: lokasatyato bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ satyameva yaduta astyātmā nāstyātmā ityādi paryāyāḥ |
SA16n1277:73: asti vastutaḥ sattva iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ ayaṃ mahāmohaḥ |
SA16n1277:81: jananamaraṇavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti vacanaṃ hi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |
SA16n1277:82: yadi śūnyatābuddhipratilābhī vadati nāsti sattva iti |
SA16n1277:85: kiṃ nu sattva iti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te |
SA16n1277:91: duḥkhaṃ śūnyo nirātmā ca jātivyayavināśanaḥ || iti |
SA16n1277:94: (u) yasya puruṣasya śūnyatātattvajñānaṃ notpannaṃ tasyāstyātmeti matirbhavati |
SA16n1277:96: yathāha bhagavān-ye bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyo nāstyātmā,
SA16n1277:97: na punaḥ karoti iti śrutavantaḥ te mahābhītā bhavanti |
SA16n1277:99: ato jñāyate apratilabdhaśūnyatājñānaḥ astyātmeti matyā nirvāṇādbibheti |
SA16n1277:103: apratilabdhaśūnyatātattvo nāsti kiñcanetidṛ ṣṭyā durgatau patati yadutocchedadṛṣṭi[rūpa]mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |
SA16n1277:104: yo'yaṃ lokasatyato'styātmeti prajñāya asti karmaphalamiti śraddadhānaḥ paścāt saṃskārā anityā utpattinirodhalakṣaṇā iti bhāvayitvā nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti |
SA16n1277:106: sa yadi nāsti kiñcaneti vacanaṃ śṛṇoti |
SA16n1277:109: kecittīrthikā apavadanti śramaṇo gautamaḥ paramārthata ātmānaṃ dūṣayatīti |
SA16n1277:110: ato bhagavānāha- lokasatyato vadāmi asti sattva iti |
SA16n1277:111: samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayan vadāmi santi sattvāḥ sandhāvantaḥ saṃsaranta iti |
SA16n1277:124: yathā citritaḥ pradīpaḥ pradīpa ityukto'pi na pradipavṛttiko bhavati |
SA16n1277:125: evaṃ ghaṭo'stīti kathito'pi na vastusan bhavati |
SA16n1277:126: santi pañcaskandhā ityuktā api na paramārthāḥ ||
SA16n1277:129: (pṛ) kathaṃ ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptitaḥ santi na vastutaḥ |
SA16n1277:131: yathā vadanti idaṃ rūpaṃ idaṃ ghaṭarūpamiti |
SA16n1277:149: yathā vedanā na vedayate vijānāti ca |
SA16n1277:179: manovijñānamapi sattvādau vikṣipati yaduta kāyaḥ sattvaḥ cittaṃ sattva iti |
SA16n1277:180: evaṃ rūpādaya eva ghaṭa athavā rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭa ityādi |
SA16n1277:181: paramārthavacane tu cittaṃ samādadhāti na vikṣipati |
SA16n1277:182: rūpaṃ paśyāmīti [vat] śabdamapi paśyāmīti na vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1277:187: rūpādayo dharmā jñeyādāvanabhidheyā iti na vyapadiśyante |
SA16n1277:194: yaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kuśalaṃ karoti sa vidvān |
SA16n1277:204: yathāha bhagavān-vidvān mūḍhaśca sarvaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1277:213: yathāha-[kṣipraṃ] dharmaṃ vijānāti vijño jihvā sūparasaṃ yathā |
SA16n1277:226: rūparasagandhasparśānupādāya hi ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ |
SA16n1277:228: (13) prajñaptau ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā iti |
SA16n1277:229: rūpādiṣu tu na saṃśayo bhavati rūpaṃ vā kiṃ vā śabda iti |
SA16n1277:230: (pṛ) rūpādāvapi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti |
SA16n1277:232: rūpaṃ paśyan naiva saṃśete ayaṃ śabda iti |
SA16n1277:233: anyasmāt kāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti |
SA16n1277:234: yathā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti śrutvā punā rūpaṃ paśyan saṃśete kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti |
SA16n1277:236: (pṛ) nirodhasatye'pi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti nirodhaḥ kiṃ vā nāsti nirodha iti |
SA16n1277:237: (u) abhiniviṣṭeṣu saṃśayo bhavati na tu nirodhasatye |
SA16n1277:238: asti nirodha iti mataṃ nāsti nirodha iti matañca yaḥ śṛṇoti tasya bhavati saṃśayaḥ kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti |
SA16n1277:241: nirodhasatyaṃ paśyato na punaḥ saṃśayo bhavati |
SA16n1277:256: snehadveṣādivikalpo yaḥ kaścana sa sarvaḥ prajñaptisan |
SA16n1277:262: dāhyate pradāhyate ityādi yā kācana kriyā sarvā sā prajñaptisatī |
SA16n1277:269: prāṇātipātādi pāpaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādi puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ na paramārthasat |
SA16n1277:284: tathā śūnyatayā yat khaṇḍanaṃ tattu paramārthasat |
SA16n1277:295: anirvacanīyatvam-rūpādaya eva vā ghaṭaḥ kiṃ vā tadvayatirikto ghaṭa iti na nirvaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1277:302: (u) ekatvavāde doṣo yaduta rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekaṃ vibhaktam |
SA16n1277:310: (pṛ) yathā ekaikaṃ tilaṃ na kalāpaṃ sādhayati |
SA16n1277:325: ato jñāyate rūpādaya eva na pṛthivīti |
SA16n1277:326: laukikā vadanti-pṛthivīrūpaṃ pṛthivīgandhaḥ pṛthivīrasaḥ pṛthivīsparśaṃ iti |
SA16n1277:327: na paśyāmo rūparūpamiti vadantaṃ yaṃ kañcana |
SA16n1277:335: tathāpi svātmarūpeṇaiva svātmapradarśanaṃ [iti vadataḥ] ko doṣaḥ |
SA16n1277:336: (u) yadyucyate pṛthivī rūpādinā svātmānameva pradarśayatīti nāyaṃ nyāyo bhavati |
SA16n1277:340: śilāpuruṣasya hasta iti pradarśane tadanyaḥ kāyaḥ śilāpuruṣa iti syāt |
SA16n1277:343: tasmin samaye śilāpuruṣa eva na punastadanyo'stītyucyate |
SA16n1277:344: yathā bhagavānāha-santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ityādi |
SA16n1277:347: ato jñāyate śilāpuruṣa iti vacanamapi mṛṣāvacanam, iti |
SA16n1277:356: rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī iti tu vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1277:372: na syāt rūpamātre pṛthivīṃ paśyāmīti pṛthivīsaṃjñā |
SA16n1277:377: yathā kaścid vṛkṣaśākhāṃ chindan vadati-vṛkṣaṃ chindāmi,
SA16n1277:387: ato jñāyate na sarvāṇi bhautikāni śabdavantīti ||
SA16n1277:409: ato jñāyate na pṛthak santi pṛthivyādayo dharmā iti |
SA16n1277:413: kāyendriyeṇa spṛṣṭvāpi jānīmaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti |
SA16n1277:420: na hyandhakāre vivecayati ghaṭo vā jighrayate kapālaṃ vā |
SA16n1277:421: ghaṭo vā rasyate kapālaṃ vā iti |
SA16n1277:422: (u) yadyapi na vivecayati kiṃ ghaṭa uta kapālamiti |
SA16n1277:423: tathāpi mṛdi jñānaṃ bhavati mṛdaṃ jighrāmi,
SA16n1277:426: tadā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā vā na nirdhārayati kimayaṃ ghaṭa śarāvaḥ kiṃ vā ghataśakalamiti |
SA16n1277:427: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyañca na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt iti |
SA16n1277:428: andhakāre ghaṭabuddhirutpannā'pi na vivecayati suvarṇaghaṭo rajataghaṭo vā iti |
SA16n1277:429: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyamapi na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt |
SA16n1277:432: yathā [cakṣuḥ] puṣpādi paśyati na vivicya jānāti gandhaḥ surabhirasurabhirvā raso madhuro'madhuro vā ityādi |
SA16n1277:433: ato yadi mataṃ cakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ jānīmo dravyaṃ na ghrāṇajihvābhyāmiti |
SA16n1277:435: yathā ghrāṇajihve dravyaṃ pṛthakkṛtya na vikalpayataḥ |
SA16n1277:436: tathā cakṣuḥkāyendriye api dravyamapṛthagbhūtamapi na vikalpayataḥ |
SA16n1277:448: na tu sarvo rūpātpṛthagbhūto dharmo dṛśyaḥ |
SA16n1277:454: yadi ca dṛśyadharmeṇa tadanyadharma upalabhya dṛśyo bhavati |
SA16n1277:462: indriyeṇa rūpaṃ dṛśyamitīdaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ punaralakṣaṇaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1277:474: na tatrāsti vinigamanā rūpamātramupalabdhikaraṃ nānye dharmā iti |
SA16n1277:482: yathā andho'bhyastaghaṭaparimāṇo vinaṣṭacakṣuṣko'pi spṛṣṭvā ghaṭaṃ jānāti |
SA16n1277:486: bhavatāṃ sūtre'pyuktam-kāyāgataspṛṣṭaḥ sparśo na pṛthivyaptejasāṃmiti jñātavyam-adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti |
SA16n1277:489: andha imaṃ vāyuṃ jānannapi na jānāti vāyurayaṃ kiṃ dṛśyaḥ kiṃvā adṛśya iti |
SA16n1277:498: (u) asmanmate rūpaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo dharmo dṛśyaḥ |
SA16n1277:499: ato jñāyate mate['smin] yatra rūpamutpannamasti tatra cakṣuḥ paśyati |
SA16n1277:503: ato rūpadi vihāya pṛthagasti ghaṭa itīdaṃ na nyāyyam ||
SA16n1277:517: yathā cakṣurvijñānena rūpaṃ jñāyate, na śabdādi |
SA16n1277:529: ato jñāyate paramārthato nānirvācyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñaptāveva ekatvanānātvasatvāducyate'nirvācya iti ||
SA16n1277:533: (u) abhāvatve na puṇyapāpādīnāṃ vipāko vimuktyādayaḥ sarve dharmāḥ |
SA16n1277:534: vidyamānaṃ nāstīti grahe sa graho'pi abhāvaḥ syāt |
SA16n1277:536: asti nāstīti vādāḥ śraddhayoktāḥ pratyakṣajñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti anumitijñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti |
SA16n1277:538: yatkiñcana nāstīti yat vacanaṃ tadeṣu triṣu na bhavati |
SA16n1277:539: sūtraṃ vānusarāma iti bhavatāmāśayo[yaḥ] nāyaṃ yujyate |
SA16n1277:555: sarve dharmā abhāvā iti bhavata āśaye jñānamidaṃ kiṃ pratītya bhavati |
SA16n1277:560: tadā sarve janā yathābhipretaṃ yatkiñcana kuryuḥ |
SA16n1277:568: yadi kāraṇena na prakāśayati [tadā] paragṛhītaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sidhyet |
SA16n1277:570: yo bhāvaḥ kāraṇena sādhyaḥ na so'bhāva ityucyate ||
SA16n1277:580: avayavinyagrāhye'pi avayavā grāhyā iti bhavato yanmatam |
SA16n1277:591: sūkṣmāvayavān paśyato'vayavabuddhiḥ sadā bhavati na ghaṭabuddhiḥ |
SA16n1277:620: na hi cakṣuḥ sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1277:621: na ca mano gṛhṇāti pratyutpannaṃ rūpam |
SA16n1277:624: manovijñānantu atīte anāgate vartate na rūpe vartate |
SA16n1277:653: kiṃ rūpaṃ prāpya paśyati kiṃ vā'prāpya paśyati |
SA16n1277:664: (u) yadi cakṣuraprāptamapi jñānagocara ityucyate sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ jñānagocaraḥ syāt |
SA16n1277:667: yadi sati pūrvameva cakṣuṣi rūpe ca paścāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate |
SA16n1277:680: yadi padārtho nirāyatanaḥ tadā āśritya tiṣṭhatīti na labhyate |
SA16n1277:681: yadi bravīṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣo'lpabhāga utpadyate yadi vā vyāpyotpadyate |
SA16n1277:688: ekaikavijñānāvayavo na vijānāti avayavī tu vijānāti |
SA16n1277:705: ato jñāyate śabdo na śrāvya iti |
SA16n1277:710: śabdo'yaṃ prāpya aprāpya vā ubhayathā'pi na śravaṇīyaḥ |
SA16n1277:739: pūrvoktavat gandhaḥ prāpto vā aprāpto gṛhyata ityubhayathā'sti doṣaḥ |
SA16n1277:743: sūkṣmādyavayaveṣveva sparśajñānaṃ notpadyata iti yathāpūrvaṃ vaktavyam |
SA16n1277:749: manovijñānaṃ hi na pratyutpannān rūparasagandhasparśān gṛhṇāti |
SA16n1277:752: (pṛ) yadi manovijñānaṃ rūpādīn dharmān na jānāti |
SA16n1277:762: (u) yathā kasyacit cittaṃ svātmānamajñātvā'pi cintā bhavati ahaṃ cittavāniti |
SA16n1277:774: hetau pūrvaṃ san vā guṇa utpadyeta |
SA16n1277:782: ato na hetau pūrvaṃ san guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati |
SA16n1277:783: bhavato yadi mataṃ hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayatīti |
SA16n1277:787: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu śuklatantuḥ śuklapaṭaṃ sādhayati |
SA16n1277:789: yadi hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati |
SA16n1277:790: kasmāt śuklatantuḥ śukla[paṭa]meva sādhayati na kṛṣṇam |
SA16n1277:791: ato na hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati |
SA16n1277:800: (pṛ) dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu ghaṭaṃ kiyamāṇam kathaṃ nāsti ghaṭa iti |
SA16n1277:830: hetau niruddhe kena phalamutpadyeta yathā avidyamānaḥ pitā kathaṃ putramutpādayet |
SA16n1277:834: yadi hetuḥ phalañca samakālam na tarhi ayaṃ nyāyaḥ |
SA16n1277:835: yathā dve śṛṅge yugapadudbhūte nocyete vāmadakṣiṇe'nyonyahetuke |
SA16n1277:846: laukikā na paśyanti kañcana dharmaṃ hetuphalayorapṛthagbhāvarūpam |
SA16n1277:856: na ca paścāmaḥ kañcana dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ kurvantam |
SA16n1277:863: cakṣuṣo rūpasya naivaṃ bhavati-āvāṃ saha vijñānamabhinirvartayāva iti |
SA16n1277:875: garbhe'pi bālānāṃ cakṣurādikāyāvayaveṣu kaḥ sacittatvaṃ karoti |
SA16n1277:884: dṛṣṭe ca karmakaraṇe citte vikalpayati-evaṃ kartavyaṃ,
SA16n1277:894: yat bhavān nānākāraṇairbravīti-sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā iti |
SA16n1277:914: tathāgatāḥ paraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāraṃ prakṛtito naissvābhāvyaṃ viśeṣasāmānyalakṣaṇāni sarvāṇi pratividhyanti |
SA16n1277:918: (pṛ) yathā bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍagatena dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratilabdham |
SA16n1277:923: tadyathā bhagavānupadiśati sarvadharmāḥ pratītya samutpannā iti |
SA16n1277:926: vicitrāṅkādīni rūpāṇi nṛttagītādayo nādā gandharasasparśā apramāṇaviśeṣā nopadeśyāḥ |
SA16n1277:927: upadeśe'pi nāsti mahaddhitam ityata īdṛśaṃ vastu nopadiśati bhagavān |
SA16n1277:929: yathā kaścit citrāṅkanādidharmavikalpamajñātvā vadati tāni na santīti |
SA16n1277:930: tathā bhavānapi yatkimapyasādhayitvā vadati nāstīdaṃ-vastu iti |
SA16n1277:933: yathā jātyandho vadati nāsti kṛṣṇamavadātaṃ vā,
SA16n1277:936: yadyevam, pratītyasiddhatvānna santi sarve dharmā iti vaktuṃ pāryate |
SA16n1277:939: ato jñāyate rūpādayaḥ sarvadharmāḥ santi yathā ghaṭādayaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santīti ||
SA16n1277:946: (u) santi vastutaḥ pañcaskandhā iti cittaṃ dharmacittamityucyate |
SA16n1277:947: pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā samyagbhāvayato dharmacittaṃ nirudhyate |
SA16n1277:948: (pṛ) yogī paśyati pañcaskandhān śūnyān yaduta pañcaskandheṣu nāsti nityadharmaḥ sthiradharmo'vināśadharmo'vipariṇāmadharma ātmāmīyadharma iti |
SA16n1277:960: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yogāvacara idaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati yāvadidaṃ vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ṣaśyati iti |
SA16n1277:961: na tu rūpādayaḥ pañcaskandhā na santīti jñātavyam |
SA16n1277:964: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogāvacaraḥ paśyati rūpādīn dharmān anityalakṣaṇān vikṣepalakṣaṇān vināśalakṣaṇān māyālakṣaṇān nirvedalakṣaṇān iti |
SA16n1277:967: taddarśanaṃ tāvadvayavadānā[tmakam] ato jñāyate pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyatīti |
SA16n1277:971: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvatastu na tat punarabhimukhībhabati |
SA16n1277:973: tadyathā kaścana vṛkṣaḥ krakacakṛtto bhasmasātkṛtaḥ prakṣīṇaḥ |
SA16n1277:981: ato jñāyate yaḥ sattvaparibhedaḥ iyaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatā |
SA16n1277:983: bhāvanā ca dvividhā-śūnya[tā-] bhāvanā nairātmyabhāvanā iti |
SA16n1277:985: yathā kaścit jalaṃ nāstīti ghaṭa śūnyaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1277:986: tathā pañcaskandheṣu pudgalo nāstīti [tān] śūnyān paśyati |
SA16n1277:999: paramārthataḥ śūnyamiti vacanam-ayamarthasatyataḥ śūnyo na saṃvṛtisatyata iti |
SA16n1277:1000: paramārthaśca yaduta rūpaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam yāvadvijñānaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam |
SA16n1277:1001: ato yadrūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ tat paramārthaśūnyatādarśanamityucyate |
SA16n1277:1006: tadarthamucyante pañca skandhāḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyā iti |
SA16n1277:1007: (pṛ) kiṃ nu khalu sūtre noktam asti karma asti phalam,
SA16n1277:1009: (u) ayaṃ hetuḥ dharmaṇāṃ kārakākhyo nopalabhyata itīdaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatābhidhānam |
SA16n1277:1011: prajñaptisaṃjñā ca yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjarāmaraṇaduḥkhasamudayanirodho bhavati iti |
SA16n1277:1012: asmādvacanāt jñāyate pañcaskandhā api paramārthato na santīti |
SA16n1277:1015: ya āha-sa eva jīvaḥ tadeva śarīram,
SA16n1277:1019: yeṣāmeṣā dṛṣṭiḥ na te macchrāvakā na brahmacāriṇa iti |
SA16n1277:1020: yat tasya jarāmaraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate tat prajñaptikhaṇḍanam |
SA16n1277:1028: uktañca sūtre-yo dharmo māyā sa mṛṣā |
SA16n1277:1036: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsamasadvai parayā dhiyā || iti |
SA16n1277:1044: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na paramārthasanta iti |
SA16n1277:1047: na sambhavati skandhāḥ satyaṃ skandhābhāvo'pi satyamiti vaktum |
SA16n1277:1050: tathā yo'mugdhaḥ na sa paśyati skandhān |
SA16n1277:1054: yathāhānandaḥ-dharmānupādāya asmīti sidhyati yaduta rūpaskandhaṃ yāvadvijñānaskandhamupādāyeti |
SA16n1277:1059: api ca me āyuṣmantaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu asmīti adhigatam |
SA16n1277:1070: ato jñāyate pañcopādānaskandhā api śūnyā iti |
SA16n1277:1074: na tīrthikānāmiva rūpaprahāṇakāle jñāyate vastusat rūpaṃ,
SA16n1277:1076: yogī avaśyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyati nirodhadarśanāt animitte'vatarati |
SA16n1277:1077: ato jñāyate rūpādayo na paramārthasanta iti |
SA16n1277:1081: phenasūtre bhagavānāha-yadi puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍaṃ paśyet yoniśa upaparīkṣeta |
SA16n1277:1096: ato jñāyate skandhā na paramārthasanta iti |
SA16n1277:1112: yathāha bhagavān-yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivī [dhātu]ḥ ityādi |
SA16n1277:1113: ya imāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratilabhate sa vadati nāsti yatkiñciditi |
SA16n1277:1117: ato jñāyate sarve saṃskārā niruddhā bhavantīti |
SA16n1277:1118: yadi vastusantaḥ saṃskārāḥ tadā na syuḥ samyak prahāṇavimuktinirodhāḥ |
SA16n1277:1120: ato draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthataḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve'bhāvātmakāḥ saṃvṛtitastu santi saṃskārā iti ||
SA16n1277:1137: śāstramāha-etāni trīṇi cittāni nirodhayato yogāvacarasya karmakleśā naiva punaḥ samudācaranti (pṛ)
SA16n1277:1140: yathā pradīpo dharmaśca sati niśraye vartate |
SA16n1277:1144: anāsravā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ sarvāṇi nimittāni tathā pradahati yathā na kiñcidavaśiṣyate |
SA16n1277:1146: nimittābhāvāt karmakleśānāṃ na punaḥ samudayo bhavati |
SA16n1277:1148: arhataḥ śūnyatājñānagatiṃgatasya asmimānarahitasya na punaḥ samudyanti |
SA16n1277:1151: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati |
SA16n1277:1152: asati ca tṛṣṇācitte na karmāṇi pacyante |
SA16n1277:1153: yathā anabhiṣyanditāyāṃ bhūmau bījaṃ na prarohati |
SA16n1277:1154: yogāvacarasyāsya sarvavijñānasthitiṣu sarvanimittanirodhe vijñānaṃ nirāśrayaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1277:1159: sa kleśābhāvāt vikalahetupratyayaḥ satsvapi karmasu nopapattiṃ vedayate |
SA16n1277:1161: kāyaṃ vedayata ityataḥ tasya karmāṇi vipākaṃ prayacchanti |
SA16n1277:1164: yathā adharmeṇa prabalamadhitiṣṭhati uttamarṇo nāvakāśaṃ labhate |
SA16n1277:1166: saṃsāre'vartamānasya santyapi karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti |
SA16n1277:1167: yathā baddhaṃ puruṣamanye janā yatheṣṭaṃ nindanti |
SA16n1277:1168: evaṃ kleśabaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmatāratamyavaśāt [kleśāḥ] vipākaṃ prayacchanti |
SA16n1277:1171: śūnyacaryāvihāritvādasya puruṣasya dharmeṣu svalakṣaṇa[saṃjñā] nāstītyataḥ karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti |
SA16n1277:1175: kleśavege kṣīṇe tu na tāni pravartante |
SA16n1277:1176: yathā cakraṃ gatisthamapi vegakṣayānna punaḥ pravartate |
SA16n1277:1178: yathā sutavatsalāyā mātuḥ raktaṃ stanyaṃ pariṇamate |
SA16n1277:1184: ataḥ sadapi prāktanaṃ karma na vipākaṃ prayacchati |
SA16n1277:1185: evamasya prāktanaṃ karma pratyutpanne kiñci[dvipāka] marpayati |
